channel.title: What are the patch notes?!
channel.description:
1.1.4b, 1.1.4c
there are no patch notes, anywhere. How come there are no patch notes whenever a minor patch goes out? If things get changed, players want to know about them! This is just a simple request for more transparency.
Even if it's just one line. "we fixed a graphics portrait issue" ok at least we know its not some crazy undocumented unannounced change then

item.title: What are the patch notes?!
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Minor ones like reverts and things have often been announced in the Discord. Major ones always come up with the big massive wall of text with class reworks and conditions

Read full topic

item.title: What are the patch notes?!
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
Maybe we magically just skipped over those patches or maybe they were announced in discord as like a revert or something

Read full topic
